title: What is the viral ‘Oatzempic’ trend? Does it actually help in weight loss?

Sustainable weight loss requires balanced diet and exercise, not quick online fixes.

title: Delhi man walks into police station, confesses to killing mother, 2 siblings
description: A 25-year-old man confessed to police in Delhi, claiming he drugged and strangled his mother, sister, and teenage brother. Financial stress and marital discord reportedly fueled the horrific act. The accused allegedly used sedatives from dhatura seeds mixed into prasad laddoos before committing the murders. Police are awaiting autopsy reports for confirmation.

title: 'Culprit not her ex-boyfriend': Was Hyd woman working in US murdered over money?
description: A 27-year-old Indian woman, Nikitha Godishala, was found murdered in Maryland, USA. Police are searching for Arjun Sharma, who allegedly fled to India after borrowing money from Nikitha. description: The Supreme Court has strongly criticized the Uttarakhand government for its two-decade inaction against widespread forest land encroachment in Rishikesh. Recent drives have recovered some land, but the court seeks comprehensive accountability.

title: Delhi family attacked, son stripped on Delhi street over gym feud
description: A dispute over a gym operating from a residential property in east Delhi's Laxmi Nagar allegedly led to a violent assault. A man was beaten, his wife molested, and their son stripped and assaulted on the street. CCTV footage captured the incident, and the caretaker has been arrested.

title: 'My son wasn’t even in Delhi during riots': Umar Khalid's father
description: Supreme Court denied bail to student activists Umar Khalid and Sharjeel Imam in the 2020 Delhi riots case, deeming their roles distinct from five others granted relief. Families expressed deep disappointment and a sense of injustice, highlighting years of incarceration without trial. While relieved for the other accused, they lamented the continued struggle for their loved ones' freedom.

Environment minister Manjinder Singh Sirsa countered, accusing AAP of avoiding debate and exposing their failures.

Trump flips Monroe into Donroe: How US plans to reshape the Western Hemisphere — explained
description: US President Donald Trump has revived and expanded the Monroe Doctrine, now dubbed the "Donroe Doctrine," to assert American dominance across the Western Hemisphere. This aggressive approach has led to military action in Venezuela, threats against Cuba and Colombia, and ambitions for Greenland, signaling a significant shift in US foreign policy.

title: OpenAI IPO plans: Altman says he has no interest in CEO role; timeline remains uncertain
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has expressed zero enthusiasm for leading a public company, despite acknowledging an IPO is likely necessary for capital and growth.  While he finds public market participation in value creation appealing, he anticipates the process will be 'annoying.'  The AI giant, valued at potentially $1 trillion, is reportedly preparing for a 2026 or 2027 listing.

title: Vanessa Bryant says friends pushed her forward long after Kobe’s Lakers legacy
description: Vanessa Bryant, widow of NBA legend Kobe Bryant, continues to champion the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation. Recently, she shared a striking photo, crediting her friends for encouraging her to be more present in pictures.  She also celebrated Taylor Swift wearing Kobe Bryant merchandise, a gesture her daughters, avid Swifties, would appreciate.

title: Taylor Swift reportedly shaken by Travis Kelce’s confession ahead of wedding
description: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce have been dealing with a lot on their plate ever since they announced their engagement last year. While the two have kept themselves busy with planning their wedding, it seems Taylor Swift is deeply unsettled by some of Travis Kelce's words that he has said in public about his past. It seems this has become a huge deal for Taylor Swift ahead of their wedding.

title: Matthew Mercer steps back from Critical Role livestream amid burnout reflection
description: Matthew Mercer has stepped back from leading Critical Role’s “Dungeons and Dragons” livestream after opening up about burnout and creative exhaustion. While he remains involved in major projects like animated series and game publishing, Brennan Lee Mulligan now serves as game master for Campaign Four. Mercer says taking time away is essential for long-term creativity, balance, and renewed inspiration.

title: Math genius Joel David Hamkins says AI models are basically useless for math tasks
description: Renowned mathematician Joel David Hamkins has voiced strong doubts about large language models' utility in mathematical research, calling their outputs "garbage" and "not mathematically correct." He highlights AI's frustrating tendency to confidently assert incorrectness and resist correction, mirroring unproductive human interactions. Despite AI's benchmark successes, Hamkins finds current systems unreliable for genuine research collaboration.
